text: Hey all, I am running into rendering issues with hubDB dynamic pages. So I created a couple new columns to be displayed on both the parent page as well as the dynamic subpages, but for some reason the data from the new columns would only render on the parent page, but not the subpages. Any content updates in the existing columns do get updated instantly even on the subpages, so I don’t understand why the new columns didn’t take, and only on subpages…
Never mind! Found the solution! I just need to update the data source in the page settings as well!
